name: infracag2certrequest
description: Request certificate from InfraCA G2 via Azure Cloud RA
helpMarkDown: This task can be used to request a certificate from the InfraCA G2. Instructions for the task can be found [here](https://confluence.aws.abnamro.org/display/CS/Azure+DevOps+Pipeline+Extension)
author: O&I Certificate Services
instanceNameFormat: Request certificate from InfraCA G2 via Azure Cloud RA

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceNameARM
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to configure before running PowerShell

inputs.name: resourcegroup
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the Resource Group.

inputs.name: keyvault
inputs.label: Key vault
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of an existing key vault in which the certificate will be stored.

inputs.name: commonname
inputs.label: Common Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Certificate common name (also known as subject). The common name must adhere to the naming conventions [see here](https://confluence.aws.abnamro.org/display/CS/Azure+DevOps+Pipeline+Extension)

inputs.name: email
inputs.label: E-mail address
inputs.helpMarkDown: E-mail address that is used to send expiry notifications.

inputs.name: certname
inputs.label: Certificate Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name that will be used for the certificate in the Azure Key Vault. This must be an existing certificate for renewals or revocations.

inputs.name: oarid
inputs.label: OAR-id
inputs.helpMarkDown: OAR-id for which the certificate will be used. The OAR-id will be in the 2nd SAN field of the certificate.

inputs.name: environment
inputs.label: Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select one, must match the resource group

inputs.name: san
inputs.label: Subject Alternative Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Subject Alternative Names, one per line

inputs.name: reason
inputs.label: Revocation reason
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select one, must match the resource group

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Certificate version to revoke
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of the certificate to be revoked (can be found in Azure Key Vault certificate overview).

inputs.name: confirmRevoke
inputs.label: I understand that revoking a certificate is irreversible.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please confirm that you understand that the certificate with the version specified in the previous field will be irreveribly revoked, which may cause downtime and/or connectivity issues.
